report_title: CISA and FBI Update Advisory on Destructive Malware Targeting Organizations in Ukraine
chapter_title: CISA and FBI Update Advisory on Destructive Malware Targeting Organizations in Ukraine
text: CISA and the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) have updated joint Cybersecurity Advisory AA22-057A: Destructive Malware Targeting Organizations in Ukraine, originally released February 26, 2022. The advisory has been updated to include additional indicators of compromise for WhisperGate and technical details for HermeticWiper, IsaacWiper, HermeticWizard, and CaddyWiper destructive malware.

report_title: CISA and FBI Update Advisory on Destructive Malware Targeting Organizations in Ukraine
chapter_title: CISA and FBI Update Advisory on Destructive Malware Targeting Organizations in Ukraine
text: CISA and the FBI encourage organizations to review the update to AA22-057A as well as the Shields Up Technical Guidance webpage for ways to identify, respond to, and mitigate disruptive cyber activity.
